description:
Zofis had attained infinite power with a mask linked to the Stone of Moonlight in Demolt’s chamber. Zofis loses his impregnable shield after the Stone of Moonlight is destroyed. But even so, Zofis pulls out his trump card…Koko his partner, Sherry’s former
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atsuki Omoi yo Todoke! Dai 7 no Jutsu Zaguruzemu!!
Reach, Burning Feelings! The Seventh Spell, Zaguruzemu!
熱き思いよとどけ! 第7の術ザグルゼム!!
